plot: If dreams of child abuse weren't disturbing enough, Allison becomes spooked by a young boy's doll, who seems to have urged its owner to kill. Meanwhile, with a project deadline looming, Joe becomes concerned about his health.

Allison has a dream where the Dubois family are dolls under the control of a young boy, Oliver. When the boy's father is found dead, apparently having fallen off a ladder, her dreams reveal Oliver may have been an abused child. The Devalos' have to deal with the anniversary of their daughter's death. She committed suicide 6 years before without leaving a note or saying goodbye. Joe has been putting in a number of late nights on a major project and is a bit obsessed that one of the kids may have given him chicken pox.—garykmcd
